html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2016-09332016-10-21,  ,  ,  ,  FIN
ActIncome Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (Canadian Oil and Gas Exploration Expense)
PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (CANADIAN OIL AND GAS EXPLORATION EXPENSE) in order to (1) address the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations recommendation; and (2) ensure consistency in the wording of the definition of “Canadian oil and gas exploration expense” in both the English and the French versions of the Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2016-0276 Publication Date: 2016-11-02
AttachmentsAttachment
subject:
Regulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations
(Canadian Oil and Gas Exploration Expense)
precis: Regulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (CANADIAN OIL AND GAS EXPLORATION EXPENSE) in order to (1) address the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations recommendation; and (2) ensure consistency in the wording of the definition of “Canadian oil and gas exploration expense” in both the English and the French versions of the Regulations.
